courses_info.title: Courses and Workshops
courses_info.content: For questions about online courses and workshops, contact admissions@bocacode.com or 786-416-6640.

talent.title: Talent and Alumni
talent.content: If you're looking to hire talent, join our career fairs, need to verify a student's enrollment or request verification of their certification, contact: careerservices@bocacode.com.

form.motivation: Interested in our courses, hiring talented engineers, or something else? Reach out now.
form.conditions: By clicking the button above, you accept our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. You agree to receive calls and emails about our courses and workshops.
